body:
Hotfix

Components
  • Fixed Issues
    • Compare Networks and Competitive Dashboard
      • Fixed a bug where the user received a 'The following are invalid' error followed by a list of provider types when using certain specialty mappings.
    • Competitive Dashboard:
      • Fixed a bug where the networks dropdown was not being filtered by location.
    • Population File:
      • Fixed a bug where the user received an 'Invalid Geography' error when using a population file for the first time that was uploaded in the evening (time zone issue).
